Cozy, Brighton room with free parking Br.description: LOFT Hotel Bratislava is a 4-star hotel located in Bratislava, the city center. The hotel is within walking distance of the historic Old Town. It has a lovely view of the Presidential Palace Garden as well as the Slovak Government Office Garden. Parking is available on the property in a large underground garage for a surcharge, and WIFI is free of charge throughout the entire hotel. All 111 air-conditioned rooms in LOFT Hotel have been designed and equipped to offer maximum comfort and create a perfect experience, whether traveling for business or leisure.
